name: Falling Tiles (schuan)
description:
Falling Tiles - Epic MegaJam 2022

The objective is to destroy the missiles while you are trying to not fall to your death.
Keep your reflexes shard and try to score high.

How to Play:
WASD for movement
Space for jumping
Left Mouse click for Shooting
Escape for Quit Game
Creators:
Emiliano Da Silva
Rodrigo Romero
Juan Volpe

Sounds & Music
https://www.weloveindies.com/en

Missile Asset
https://sketchfab.com/warkarma

Launcher Asset
https://sketchfab.com/ismeteavee
